verses.name: Nehemiah 3:27
verses.text: After them the Tekoites repaired another piece, over against the great tower that lieth out, even unto the wall of Ophel.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:28
verses.text: From above the horse gate repaired the priests, every one over against his house.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:29
verses.text: After them repaired Zadok the son of Immer over against his house. After him repaired also Shemaiah the son of Shechaniah, the keeper of the east gate.

verses.name: Nehemiah 3:30
verses.text: After him repaired Hananiah the son of Shelemiah, and Hanun the sixth son of Zalaph, another piece. After him repaired Meshullam the son of Berechiah over against his chamber.
